messages.message: I'm making some changes (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/70429) to the UI and noticed that some Cypress CI tests are failing in my PR. I noticed that most (if not all) of them seem to be failing due to things unrelated to my changes. Reading the recent messages in this channel, it seems like we have had issues with cypress tests recently. What do people usually do in such a situation? Is there a way to bypass the Cypress tests in the CI after confirming that they are failing due to unrelated reasons? Or do people merge manually?

Generally speaking, we should:
1. Run it again. With this improvement (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1746220514008359), we'll only re-run the failed blocking tests
2. If you can confirm that the tests are not related to your PR, as your manager to force merge it
